title: Wombo Combo (with new Poppy)
body:
Okay, so I was thinking for a wombo combo that can be used to get people out of your base, and until the new {{champion:78}}  update came out, and I had my idea. So here's the team first:
{{champion:150}} :Top
{{champion:78}} :Jungle
{{champion:268}} :Support
{{champion:18}} : ADC
{{champion:81}} : AP Mid

So the combo would be {{champion:150}}  ulting the whole enemy team (if possible) into {{champion:268}} in which he would ult while they were flying, leading to a well aimed {{champion:18}} ult, then to a fully charged {{champion:78}} ult popping the enemy team all back into their base (if it flies that far).  While this is happening, {{champion:81}} would time his ult at the precise moment so that it would hit all of them, (not sure if this works, need proof) then with the help of {{champion:78}} 's ult, they would fly straight back into {{champion:81}} 's ult getting dealt more damage.

So here's my Wombo Combo, I would Like any advice, add-ons or other ideas for other Wombos.

BTW people have asked how to pronounce my name, it's pronounced Neo-Roshe as in the word "rose" but with a "shh" sound

NeoRouge

replies.body: Apart from that being completely wasteful, i do believe that an Ezreal ult can only hit once (not to mention it would be down to it's 30% damage for the second hit)
